title: STAT+: Why some hospitals are making their own ChatGPTs for patient records
description: Some large health systems are building their own AI-powered chatbots to make it easier for their clinicians to query patients' health records.
content: Some large health systems are building their own AI-powered chatbots to make it easier for their clinicians to query patients' health records.
